name: Eldigan
description: Ruler of Nordion. Wields the Demon Sword in knightly devotion to any master. Older brother of Lachesis. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.
origin: Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War
insights: Eldigan is the only hero with Mystletainn.
Eldigan has the highest <abbr title="Health Points">HP</abbr> potential possible among Cavalry heroes.

dialogue.text: I am Eldigan. Those who defy my lord will meet my blade. But I trust that you and I will have no such problem.
Prince Alfonse seems thoughtful and considerate. He will be an excellent ruler of this realm.
Oh, my dear sister, Lachesis... I know that I vowed to come back soon, alive and well. But circumstances have changed.
In my world I was prepared to face death, but some twist of fate has brought me here. Perhaps this too is part of the tangled nature of destiny.
A knight's loyalty must remain absolute. My sister sees it differently, but I cannot veer from duty.

My great friend Sigurd has a young son named Seliph. I wonder, in this unusual realm we stand in... could I possibly meet Seliph as a grown man—surely, a heroic figure like his father? That would be marvelous.
My name is Eldigan. I come bearing the friendliest of greetings from <Friend Name>.
I will reach for even loftier goals. This I swear.
A knight must strive for the heights of excellence.
Inadequate. Has my grasp of greatness slipped?
I vow to put this power to certain purpose.

After I was summoned into this realm, I had a strange revelation. Where I came from, I placed my absolute loyalty in my lord. But here, that lord is you. A knight of my caliber must serve his lord—no matter what the cut of that lord. So I have always believed. But I will confess this, now that I have spent so much time with you. I am honored to pledge my sword to a master of your qualities. Still, a knight cannot choose his master, and so I count myself most fortunate to have met you. Again and always—I forever pledge my sword and my loyalty to you.
